content: clean sweep this quick and easy flower-shaped dishcloth is hand-sized perfect for cleaning and a great stash-buster materials h hook 5 0mm worsted weight cotton yarn less than 50 yards gauge not important size approximately 8 inches across key chain = chain the indicated number of stitches single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet tc = triple crochet all terms are us crochet terms pattern notes the chain 2 at the beginning of the initial rounds does not count as the first double_crochet the number of stitches in each round is indicated at the end of the row round 1 - start with magic_ring  12 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 12 round 2 - chain 2 2dc in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 24 round 3 - chain 2 double_crochet in first stitch 2dc in next stitch around slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 36 round 4 - chain 2 double_crochet in first 2 stitches 2dc in next stitch around slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 48 round 5 - chain 2 double_crochet in first 3 stitches 2dc in next stitch around slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 60 round 6 - chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in next 2 stitches 3tc in next stitch double_crochet in next 2 stitches around slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join finish off if desired an optional hanging loop can be added by chaining 10 stitches at the end prior to joining with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet
